content.text: 将字符串截断到最大长度并添加自定义省略号后缀。Truncates a string to a maximum length and adds a custom ellipsis suffix
带有自定义省略号的截断字符串，或在限制内的原始字符串。Truncated string with custom ellipsis, or original string if within limit
当参数类型不符合预期时。When parameters are not of expected types

```ts
// Basic usage
ellipsis('hello world', 5); // -> 'he...'
ellipsis('hello world', 8); // -> 'hello...'
```

```ts
// Custom ellipsis
ellipsis('hello world', 5, '***'); // -> 'he***'
ellipsis('hello world', 8, ' [more]'); // -> 'h [more]'
ellipsis('hello world', 10, '…'); // -> 'hello wor…'
```

```ts
// No truncation needed
ellipsis('hello world', 20); // -> 'hello world'
ellipsis('short', 10); // -> 'short'
```

```ts
// Unicode strings
ellipsis('你好世界', 2); // -> '你…' (properly handles Unicode)
ellipsis('café restaurant', 6, '...'); // -> 'caf...'
```

```ts
// Edge cases
ellipsis('', 5); // -> ''
ellipsis('hello', 3, '...'); // -> '...' (ellipsis longer than maxLength)
ellipsis('hello', 10, ''); // -> 'hello' (empty ellipsis)
```
